description:
Illana wants Joey to bring a ton of oxygen for a Loose Socks concert. Mr. Mustachio and Dr. Elefun are getting old. Tink thinks Princess Sapphire`s hoarse voice sounds pretty badass. 38-year-old Manabu-kun can hardly find himself, much less a marriage partner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol Okkake no Akubi-chan / Hige Oyaji to Ochanomizu Hakase no Oyaji Talk / Sapphire no Uragoe Renshuu / Kekkonsoudan Tokoro Communication Sawa no Mazakon Otoko Hen
Illana: Idol Groupee / Mr. Mustachio and Dr. Elefun`s Old Geezer Chat / Sapphire`s Falsetto Practice / Matchmaking Center: Mommy`s Boy with Communication Disorders
アイドル追っかけのアクビちゃん / ヒゲおやじとお茶の水博士のおやじトーク / サファイアの裏声練習 / 結婚相談所 コミュ障のマザコン男編
